actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Telecommunication, Consumer Protection and Finance.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Telecommunications, Consumer Protection and Finance

official_title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 to require the Federal Communications Commission to establish rules relating to the depreciation of certain property owned by common carriers subject to such Act.

summary.text: Amends the Communications Act of 1934 to permit common carriers to determine the depreciation method for classes of property used to provide communications services.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 to require the Federal Communications Commission to establish rules relating to the depreciation of certain property owned by common carriers subject to such Act.
